results.title: Funny pigeon painting, Live Love Poop pigeon print, funny pigeon drawing, Live Love Laugh print, cute bird art, bird decor, pigeon wall art
results.description:
LIVE LOVE POOP. I love pigeons, especially working-class city pigeons. They are so resilient, smart and loyal. It always makes me a little bit sad when I see them plodding along a dirty city street. They seem so baffled yet persistent, just going about their business on the ground as if they've forgotten that they can fly.

So, instead of the overused, eyeroll-inducing LIVE LOVE LAUGH sign, this is my version of an inspirational life motto.

This print would obviously be great hanging in a guest bathroom, or as a gift to the co-worker who spends an inordinately long time in the bathroom.

The print is an archival reproduction of my original painting.

Print is available in 3 sizes:
8.5 x 11"
11 x 14"

Also available as a poster:
https://www.etsy.com/listing/839220012/live-love-poop-pigeon-poster-funny?ref=shop_home_active_8&frs=1

Archival print printed with Epson Ultra Chrome pigment inks which are guaranteed to last 200 years, on Somerset Enhanced Velvet Fine Art Paper. This is a textured paper, milled by the St. Cuthberts Mill in Somerset, England, and it feels very similar to the original piece. It is an acid-free, 100% cotton, single-side coated paper showing a natural white finish with a slightly structured, soft-textured surface matte. Beautiful paper and certified archival. The print looks very much like the original drawing with vibrant colors and textured paper.

* Colors may vary slightly from what you see on the screen as computer monitors can be calibrated differently.*

Print will come signed, numbered and dated and packed in a clear cello sleeve with cardboard to avoid bending in transit. 

PRINT IS NOT FRAMED.

results.title: LIVE LAUGH LOVE wood word stacking block set for home and office decor...
results.description:
Ok, so I officially have a new favorite block set and this would be it. "Live, Laugh, Love". This looks absolutely amazing on my mantel. Don't worry...you're not taking mine. I made several :} In a few different color combos. This is a fairly large piece but still thin, which makes it perfect for a windowsill. Also great for a housewarming present! This piece measures approximately 5 1/2 inches tall by 17 1/2 inches long.

The blocks are handcut, sanded, and then painted. This design comes in several different color combos...white with dark brown, a warm caramel with white, and dark brown with caramel {as soon as I can upload pics of this color I will add it to the listings}. Please choose one of these color combinations when ordering. Or let me know if you'd like different colors altogether...I love doing custom pieces. Raffia is used for the two larger letters. These blocks are NOT attached to one another for more flexibility with display. Arrange them however you'd like. Although his piece is sprayed with a sealant, outdoor use for this item is not recommended.

Blocks range in height from 3 1/2 inches to 5 1/2 inches and are 3 1/2 inches wide. The two smaller blocks of "live" and "love" measure 1 1/2 inches tall by 3 1/2 inches long. Each piece is signed and dated on the bottom.

This is not a toy. Small pieces are used to make this piece. 

Here are some other block sets you may like:

LOVE AND LIGHT: https://www.etsy.com/listing/227325976/love-and-light-wood-word-yoga-stacking?ref=related-3

YOGA WORD BLOCKS: https://www.etsy.com/listing/216411225/yoga-wood-stacking-blocks-word-block-set?ref=shop_home_feat_3

NAMASTE: https://www.etsy.com/listing/238456778/namaste-wooden-word-block-set-for-home?ref=related-4

Thank you for stopping by!

results.title: Skeletor He-Man Live, Laugh Embroidered Patch - Iron-On Fun Heart Shaped Skeletor Embroidery Patch - Fun & Unique Clothing Patches NP01
results.description:
Funny Skeletor "Live, Love, Laugh" embroidered patch. A perfect iron-on clothing patch for your backpack, jacket, shirt or just about anything else.

*Please Note all "Iron-On" adhesive patches can be turned into sew-on patches by simply peeling the adhesive sheet off*

Color: Pink, Purple, Yellow, Back
Shape: Heart
Theme: He-Man, Skeletor
Size: 3" Inch
Type: Iron-On 
Material: Thread, Adhesive Backing

Embroidered patches can be ironed onto just about anything you can iron: shirts, jeans, hats, blouses, pants, skirts, etc. Make your backpack or tote unique!

Heat seal to polyester/cotton fabrics. Do not apply to rain-wear (waterproof), highly elastic, rayon, nylon or tri-acetate fabrics. Once applied, applique is permanently attached to garment and is washable, dry-able and dry cleanable. For machine washing, turn garment inside-out before washing and drying.

Iron on appliques and embroidered patch setting instructions using an Iron:
Step 1: Set your hand iron at the hottest temperature setting. DO NOT USE STEAM DURING APPLICATION!
Step 2: Place your applique or embroidered patch in the desired position and place a pressing cloth (such as a handkerchief, sheet or pillowcase fabric) over top.
Step 3: Press the iron straight down for 35-45 seconds with as much constant pressure as possible. NO BACK AND FORTH.
Step 4: Turn the garment inside-out and repeat steps 2 & 3.
Step 5: Allow the applique or embroidered patch to cool down.

Iron on appliques and embroidered patch setting instructions using a Heat Seal Machine:
Step 1: Set your heat seal machine to 350 degrees.
Step 2: Place your applique or embroidered patch in the desired position and place a pressing cloth (such as a handkerchief, sheet or pillowcase fabric) over top.
Step 3: Press the iron down for 20 seconds.
Step 4: Increase temperature to 375 degrees. Turn the garment inside-out and press for 15 more seconds.
Step 5: Allow the applique or embroidered patch to cool down.

results.title: Live, Laugh, Snom Wall Art - Pokémon Art, Game Room Decor, Snom Art
results.description:
Remind yourself of the three most important things in life: to Live, to Laugh, and Snom.

Wall art designed after one of the most popular Pokémon in the new generation, the Ice/Bug type Snom! It is 3D Printed out of PLA (a biodegradable plastic) to keep it sturdy, and has a hole on the top for easy hanging. 

The style makes it fit in perfectly with your game room, and can be either hung up using the hanger on top OR stuck directly to the wall using any sort of sticky hanger. Just specify in the personalization which version you want.

Length: 7 Inches
Width: 5.75 Inches
Depth: 1/16th Inch

Multiple colors are available for the Text/Snom design, should you be interested in extra customization!

results.title: Live, Love, Woof Nail & String Art
results.description:
Dogs have always held special places in our hearts and in our homes. They never cease to make us happy, comfort and admire us, and bring genuine joy in to our families. That's the inspiration behind this piece, at least as I've felt it with my fur babies. 

Live, Love, Woof is my favorite creation thus far and was made for all of you out there who love your pets as much as I love mine! Bring some of that love in to your home with this unique and beautiful piece. 10% off all sales from this go to the local SPCA.

Live, Love, Woof is 11x14in and can come in 8x10in or 16x20in. Comes with hanging hardware attached to the back for easy hanging. Wood is hand stained and all nails and string were applied by yours truly. 

Need different colors than what's pictured? Not a problem! Send me a message and I'll make sure to get the colors you want!

results.title: Breast Cancer Awareness Live Ribbon Heart Live Laugh Love Badge Reel, Retractable ID Badge Holder, Cancer Pink Ribbon, Nurse Badge Reel,7000
results.description:
Breast Cancer Awareness Live, Laugh, Love badge reel.  Show your support for breast cancer by wearing this pink ribbon with a gray heart.  

Select between a black or transparent/clear reel with a swivel spring clip or a belt/slide clip, or choose a black carabiner, a stethoscope ID tag, or a stethoscope ID tag with a matching badge reel. 

Reels are approximately 1.25" (32mm) in diameter and come with a 34" (864mm) retractable cord made from nylon with polyester woven wrap  for added durability to increase the lifespan of the reel.

The design is covered with mylar for protection and wipes clean with a soft cloth. 

The carabiner reel is perfect for attaching to your belt, key ring, lanyard, purse, etc., and is easy to clip on and off. The no-twist design will keep your ID badge facing forward. 

      *** IMPORTANT IF CHOOSING THE STETHOSCOPE ID TAG ***                
       It does not fit the 3M™ Littmann® Cardiology III™ Stethoscope. 

                 The stethoscope ID tag fits standard stethoscopes.

How does the stethoscope ID tag work? Snap the top and bottom together over the stethoscope tubing.  IT SHOULD NOT BE SNAPPED TOGETHER FIRST AS IT WILL BE VERY DIFFICULT TO UNSNAP. 

The following are available in the shop:

results.title: Live Laugh Love Pillow Cover, Faith, Religious,New Home, New House, Family, Friends, Couples, Newlyweds, Anniversary, Bride, Wedding
results.description:
Welcome to Nostalgic Revivals!  We love to make personalized, unique pillow covers!  If you would like the pillow cover to be personalized, just convo us!

You can purchase the pillow cover by itself or with the pillow insert.

This pillow is different from the ordinary ink transfer. It features a flocked heat transfer vinyl, which is raised, soft and velvety to the touch or a glitter heat transfer vinyl that is permanent and won't rub off. All transfers are die cut and heat set with a professional heat press. Select the flocked or glitter color option for the printing from the drop-down menu.

This pillow cover comes in a natural color with a high-quality cotton canvas weave fabric.  The pillow cover can be made in pure white, black or red. Please put the pillow color change in "notes to seller" at checkout. 

There are two size options available: 12" x 16" lumbar or 12" x 18" lumbar. Select the size/insert option you want from the drop-down menu.

All pillow covers have invisible zipper closures so the pillow can be easily removed and has a professional finish.  All inner seams are  over locked so there are no raw edges.

CARE:  Recommend spot washing.
Do not iron directly on the design. Iron inside out. 
All items are made in our smoke-free home.
  
*** Note all items are handmade and sewn, therefore there may be a slight difference in positioning of the design than the ones pictured.  We do our very best to uphold the quality of each of our items.

If you need your pillow cover in a week or less, we strongly recommend purchasing the Shipping Upgrade to Priority Shipping at checkout.

We thank you for choosing to buy from Nostalgic Revivals!

- If you want to apply our promotion buy 2 get 1 free.

- And please leave the note for the free items you want to get at the check out (DON'T NEED TO BE SAME PRODUCT, SAME COLOR AND SAME SIZE, ANY ITEMS WITH SAME PRICE AS TWO YOU ORDER) .
- We will process and ship all the order together. Thank you for your understanding.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
- Condition is New.
- We make all of our Decals here in the USA. Shipping from USA.
- High quality Oracle vinyl. Die cut vinyl Up to 6+ years durability.
- Perfect for Computer, Laptop, Tablet, Car, Wall, Furniture...
- These are precision- cut vinyl decals. There is no background. The background is whatever you apply it to.
- Do not buy from CHINA or THAILAND, these are knockoffs that you will need to wait a month to receive. 

The order below $10 will be shipped via USPS first class mail that USPS do not provide a tracking number and reduce the fees for customers; however, order above $10 must have a tracking number as Etsy's policy.We believe that a shipping notification with full details had been sent to you when the order shipped.

results.title: Wood Wall Word Art Rustic Sign Home Decor - Live Every Moment Laugh Every Day Love Beyond Words (#1089)
results.description:
"Live Every Moment, Laugh Every Day, Love Beyond Words"

Add a touch of love and rustic charm to your home decor with one of our gorgeous wooden signs!  Our signature look of dark wood with cream lettering will blend with any style of interior design.  Looking for a wonderful gift for family or friends?  Look no further...this will be the one they cherish for years to come!

ITEM INFO:
~ Sign measurements are 11.25 x 16 x .75 inches
~ Made from solid pine wood that has been hand cut to size
~ Wood is stained with a rich dark color and then the edges are sanded allowing for the natural wood color to show through giving it a great weathered look and leaving smooth edges.
~ Lettering and designs are applied with cream satin enamel paint.
~ A light coat of satin polyurethane is applied to seal the surface.
~ A saw tooth hanger is installed on the back of the sign so that it is ready for easy hanging when you receive it.
~ We love the beauty of nature and it shows on our signs. They may have perfect imperfections such as knots and small cracks. All of our items are made completely by hand so each sign will look slightly different and unique.
